description: I'm Kymbat, from Serbia. I am a passionate frontend developer dedicated to crafting modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications with precision and creativity.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.description: MBA graduate from a British university, passionate about frontend development. Experienced in React and modern web technologies, I focus on creating intuitive and high-performance user interfaces.

weather_app.title: Weather App
weather_app.description: A responsive React app with Tailwind CSS for real-time weather updates.

currency_converter.title: Currency Converter
currency_converter.description: A modern React app using Tailwind CSS for quick and accurate currency conversions.

to_do_list.title: To-Do List
to_do_list.description: A simple and efficient task manager built with React and Tailwind CSS to help you stay organized and productive.

expense_tracker.title: Expense Tracker
expense_tracker.description: A smart expense tracking app that helps you manage your budget and visualize spending with ease.
